Uses of Class
com.gsma.services.rcs.chat.GroupChat

  • Packages that use GroupChat 
    Package Description
    com.gsma.services.rcs.chat
    This API exposes all functionality for single chat and group chat services.

    • Uses of GroupChat in com.gsma.services.rcs.chat

      Methods in com.gsma.services.rcs.chat that return GroupChat 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GroupChat ChatService.getGroupChat(java.lang.String chatId)
      Returns a group chat in progress from its unique ID
      GroupChat ChatService.getGroupChatFor(Intent intent)
      Returns a group chat from its invitation Intent
      GroupChat ChatService.initiateGroupChat(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> contacts, java.lang.String subject, GroupChatListener listener)
      Initiates a group chat with a group of contact and returns a GroupChat instance.
      GroupChat ChatService.rejoinGroupChat(java.lang.String chatId)
      Rejoins an existing group chat from its unique chat ID
      GroupChat ChatService.restartGroupChat(java.lang.String chatId)
      Restarts a previous group chat from its unique chat ID
      Methods in com.gsma.services.rcs.chat that return types with arguments of type GroupChat 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<GroupChat> ChatService.getGroupChats()
      Returns the list of group chats in progress
